title: Changing Times - Changing Schools: Establishing Victorian Secondary Colleges
creator_credit: Victoria. Ministry of Education, Warren Thomas and Ivan Gaal
brief_description: Educational administrators, teachers, parents and students comment on a range of re-organisation arrangements developed to enable Victorian secondary schools to better respond to todays workforce requirements and the needs of young adults in schooling.
